item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m a PhD student in the mainland of China.

This blog is established for recording the solution of the problem I met at work and the love between my girl and me.

The main techniques I focus on are showed below:

  • Geant4
  • ROOT
  • python
  • TensorFlow
  • C#
  • C++
  • C

The main fields I focus on are showed below:

  • Nuclear Science and Technology
  • Embedded Programming
  • Host Computer Programming
